localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Privacy policies and data request forms SHOULD be easy to find, but many companies hide them deep in their UI. Privacy hunt is a simple, free, crowd-sourced repository to reduce that to 1 click! 😁 Find a company, click on the link, and reclaim YOUR data. 🙌
blogPost.body: Privacy policies and data request forms SHOULD be easy to find, but many companies hide them deep in their UI. Privacy hunt is a simple, free, crowd-sourced repository to reduce that to 1 click! 😁 Find a company, click on the link, and reclaim YOUR data. 🙌
blogPost.title: Privacy Hunt - We hunt data request forms, so you can reclaim YOUR data.
blogPost.author: Robert Thelen

localize.description: 隐私政策和数据请求表应该很容易找到，但许多公司将它们隐藏在用户界面的深处。Privacy Hunt是一个简单、免费、众包的存储库，只需单击一次即可！😁找到一家公司，单击链接，然后回收您的数据。🙌
localize.tagline: 我们寻找数据请求表，这样您就可以回收您的数据。

localize.description: 隱私政策和數據請求表應該很容易找到，但許多公司將它們隱藏在用戶界面的深處。Privacy Hunt是一個簡單、免費、衆包的存儲庫，只需單擊一次即可！😁找到一家公司，單擊鏈接，然後回收您的數據。🙌
localize.tagline: 我們尋找數據請求表，這樣您就可以回收您的數據。

localize.description: ProdEasy是一個產品管理平臺，聰明的團隊使用它來將客戶置於所有產品管理活動的中心。
localize.tagline: 爲各種規模的團隊提供產品管理平臺

next.title: Can’t wait to see this place when junk bonds yields go negative.

localize.full_text: 等不到垃圾债券收益率为负的时候，就可以看到这里了。
等不到垃圾債券收益率爲負的時候，就可以看到這裏了。
